name: ecl-report
description: An addon that makes reporting players in ECL (ecl.gg) easier

scripts.test: npm run test:cs && cd form && npm run test:unit && cd ..
scripts.e2e: node scripts/e2e.js && npm run e2e:ff && npm run e2e:chr && npm run e2e:post
scripts.e2e:nox: node scripts/e2e.js && npm run e2e:ff && npm run e2e:chr-nox && npm run e2e:post
scripts.e2e:nobuild: node scripts/e2e.js --no-build && npm run e2e:ff && npm run e2e:chr && npm run e2e:post
scripts.e2e:nobuild-nox: node scripts/e2e.js --no-build && npm run e2e:ff && npm run e2e:chr-nox && npm run e2e:post

author: FoseFx <info@fosefx.com>

hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build:prod && npm run e2e:nobuild
